SELECT r.content, r.rating, r.like_count, r.dislike_count, r.is_selected, r.created_at, r.updated_at, p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, u.nickname, b.type AS user_baumann_type FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN user_table u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN baumann b ON u.baumann_id = b.baumann_id WHERE r.product_id = #{product_id}
AND ( r.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND r.rating >= #{filter_rating}
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at ASC
ORDER BY r.rating DESC
ORDER BY r.rating ASC
ORDER BY r.like_count DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
